A sequence of rhythmic steps or movements usually performed to music, for pleasure or as a form of social interaction.

description: This version of the  Man Dancing emoji has the  Medium-dark Skin Tone applied, which is displayed as a Dark Brown Skin Tone on supported
apple_vendor_description: The man dancing emoji on Apple devices showcases a dynamic pose with a medium-dark skin tone, rendered with Apple's signature glossy 3D shading that emphasizes his energetic movement.  His form is depicted with smooth gradients and realistic lighting, suggesting a joyous and celebratory spirit.  This emoji, as seen on Apple devices, perfectly captures the feeling of letting loose and having a great time, often used to convey excitement or a good mood.
